title: Snoobi's
description:
Snoobi's API is a Web Service that makes use of REST-style 
architecture. If you are not familiar with REST (Representational state 
transfer) a good place to start is, for example Wiki entry about REST.
All calls to REST API need to be done through https. The URL is 
constructed from the URI part itself, service part and method part(s). 
URI stays always as https://rest.snoobi.com. The service part tells the 
API what part of Snoobi platform you are reaching and the method part tells what do you want to fetch.
